comment: Great professor with a ton of experience to pass on. Homework is a bit time consuming, but you will learn valuable methods and writing skills.

Great professor who loves what he teaches. Has real world knowledge and years of experience and stories that supplement concepts in class. Had 3 projects and a mid-term in the class which was a bit overwhelming, but is an easy grader as long as you give some effort into your work.

Had him for Introduction to Statistics.  Great teacher, enthusiastic about what he teaches.  Tests are pretty easy, he gives practice tests online that are very similar.  Attendance not taken.  Do the homework, and study for tests, and an A is definitely attainable.  Would definitely recommend him!
PROS: Wealth of actual industry experience; Sincerely a nice guy; Very fun class ? an easy A. CONS: mandatory attendance; I don't believe he is teaching anymore
